name: emergence
content:
emergence noun [U]
(BECOMING KNOWN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of something becoming known or starting to exist: emergence as China's emergence as an economic poweremergence of the emergence of a new strain of the HIV virus

emergence noun [U]
(APPEARING)
formal the fact of someone appearing by coming out from behind something: Unfortunately, I misjudged the timing of my emergence.
the fact of someone or something coming to the end of a difficult period or experience: emergence from the country's emergence from bankruptcy

Add to word list
the process of appearing: The agreement set the stage for the company's emergence from bankruptcy.
the process of becoming known or developing: The emergence of a pandemic flu virus is not only inevitable, but overdue.
